title: Greater Healing Potion
summaries: The Greater Healing Potion is a Hardmode / pre-Hardmode potion that restores 150 health. Consumption will trigger the Potion Sickness debuff.

Greater Healing Potions can be crafted or obtained from Hardmode bosses and Biome Mimics. On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version, Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, they can be obtained from Golden Crates, but on the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, they cannot be obtained outside of Hardmode.
